title: Desalting the seas
creator_credit: Stephen Sinichak and Oak Ridge National Laboratory
brief_description: Describes the various methods of purifying salt water through the use of nuclear energy, with particular emphasis on nuclear electric desalting plants which produce large amounts of power as well as pure water. Describes the growing shortage of water in a famine-threatened world of expanding population, and ways to combat this.
